kizuna_battle_d_01: Osu, new kid! You here to do a little shopping?[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_02a:
The school store’s a nice place! They’ve got
everything you need right here![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_02b: Hahaha! So you came to see me, did you?[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_03:
I’m here to check out the sandwiches they’ve got
for sale.[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_04:
The school store’s sandwiches taste great and
have excellent nutritional balance, too![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_select_04: What happened to your intensive training?
kizuna_battle_d_05:
Haha. I guess I’m just not used to it yet. All that
training kind of wore me out![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_06:
I achieved my goal, anyway, so I’m going to take
a break from sandwich making for a bit![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_07:
Oh, right. I didn’t tell you what my goal was.\c
I wanted to pay Nurse Miriam back for everything
she does for me. It was my way of saying thanks![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_08:
She’s so nice and so skilled at what she does.
I really look up to her![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_09:
I wanted to try sandwich making so I could be
skilled at doing something for other people, like\r
she is, but I guess I just wasn’t cut out for it.[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_10:
What I am cut out for, though, is being full of
energy! So I decided to focus on that instead![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_11:
Like I said in class, I think people and Pokémon
should make their strong points stronger![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_12:
You really helped me out, new kid! Take this as
my way of saying thanks.[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_13:
All right, then! What should I go with today to
get my protein in?[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_d_system_01: You formed a close bond with Ms. Dendra!
